title: looking for players who want to rank up out of Bronze.
body: Supp who is looking for good reliable players to get out of bronze.

replies.body: I'm Platinum, but I sometimes smurf and I'm always willing to help anyone get out of bronze <3

I can play Top, Jg, Mid and Support. (Note: I legitimately hate ADCs as I am envious and wish I had their positioning and right click mechanics)
I'm a macro player, meaning I think about the long term. I'll happily die in a dive if it means we come out on top. I'm selfless. I'll go in to steal a baron 1v5, even if I die for it. But mostly, I don't care if I'm behind. I know that my presence in teamfights is still required, as I can be the frontline tank, or the midline caster, who peels instead of carries. If ur looking for people tho, don't hmu. I'm a student about to go into exams and I aint needing added stress of ranked. Maybe try again next year.
If you want to have fun while getting some ranked in then I'm happy to be your friend and play some ranked games with you :)
